attributes.action: give Non Car Households an annual discount of 10% off thier Council Tax bills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We hear so much about the need to reduce car ownership and car use, but where is the incentive for households not to own a car or motorised vehicle? Giving a discount of 10% off council tax to non-car households would act as an incentive and reflect the contribution they make to reducing congestion, parking pressure and road maintenance.
